natural solution: By DeMoivre's Theorem, \begin{align} (\cos 185^\circ + i \sin 185^\circ)^{54} &= \cos 9990^\circ + i \sin 9990^\circ \\ &= \cos 270^\circ + i \sin 270^\circ \\ &= \boxed{-i}. \end{align}
